activities:
Bluelock is a cloud-enabled managed hosting provider specializing in providing accessible and insightful tools, processes and people. Bluelock’s cloud-based hosting and recovery solutions empower IT leaders by enabling them to focus on impactful, strategic initiatives instead of the day-to-day details.  

Bluelock provides its cloud-enabled managed hosting services for clients who may or may not be members of the European Union countries and/or Switzerland.  When providing cloud-enabled managed hosting services, Bluelock collects information under the direction of its clients and has no direct relationship with the individuals whose personal data it processes.  Bluelock will retain personal data processed on behalf of its clients for as long as needed to provide services to its clients.  Bluelock will retain and use this personal information as necessary to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements.  

Bluelock’s corporate website may be accessed by individuals/clients from European Union member countries and/or Switzerland.  As outlined in the Bluelock Privacy Policy, Bluelock collects personally identifiable information at several points on its website.  This information may be used for general business services and/or communications.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online data, offline data, manually processed data
